Level 1 Evocation Spell

Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Thunderwave is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Thunderwave is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Thunderwave Information

Description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 1.5m 5m (Cone) Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Constitution

How to Acquire Thunderwave

Thunderwave can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Eldritch Knight, Tempest Domain, Arcane Trickster Thunderwave can be cast by using the following Items: Ring of Absolute Force Thunderpalm Strikers Scroll of Thunderwave
